last_episode_to_air.name: And the Envelope Please
last_episode_to_air.overview: A nightclub DJ is murdered brutally, but the investigation of Cole and Bishop uncover even more than just a simple misunderstanding.Meanwhile Bishop's brother is released from prison and needs help to find a job. In the same time Cole works on the case of his murdered wife.

name: The Evidence
overview: Inspectors Cayman Bishop and Sean Cole investigate crimes in San Francisco Police Department. How does all of the pieces to the puzzle all fit together?
